Posts.Content: caligirl76 wrote: Hi all - I finished chemo (TCH) 12 weeks ago and am dying to color my hair. I'm only 38 but its an awful ashy grey color (normally my hair is brown). My onco said its okay to go ahead and color it but I know some people say to wait 6 months. Since its so short I think i'd rather color it at home myself but am worried it will come out orange or something! Anyone have any advice they want to share? Should I wait? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Coloring Hair caligirl76 Claire_in_Seattle
